name: Escape the Orb
description:
A bullet-hell game where you need to hit the book that the giant Orb is guarding.

Made in collaboration with Nia Mixson in the span of 5 days.

Asset Sources:

  • Orb, bullet, and book assets by Pixel Creations
    • Asset Pack: 16x16 RPG Items: 100 Staves, Swords, Book
  • Tileset by Rekkimaru
    • Asset Pack: Dungeon RPG Tileset
  • Player sprite by Maytch
    • Asset Pack: Free 16x16 Pixel Art 8-Directional Characters
